main: ^She rushes over to the player with a hot cup of coffee. She trips and accidentally spills it all over the table, though thankfully the player wasn’t affected as he was able to quickly get up.

c-0: ^It’s okay, it was an accident. Are you alright?
^“I’m glad you’re not hurt. Sorry for spilling your coffee, glad to see you’re okay at least.”
^She cleans up the mess with a sheepish smile, feeling bad for what happened but appreciative of the player’s forgiveness and understanding.
^“I’ll be back with your food after I clean this up.”
c-1: ^“Jeez! I could’ve gotten hurt by that, klutz!”
^“Okay, okay! I know I messed up, but you don’t have to be a jerk about it.”
^Angeline clearly feels hurt about the player’s reaction. She knows it was her fault but the player didn’t need to rub it in.
^“I’ll be back with your food after I clean this up.”
c-2: ^"Oh wow, you got strong arms! Thank you for catching me! Although, I spilled a little on your shirt, sorry"
^“I’ll be back with your food after I clean this up.”
